org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.common.jcr

Class DefaultJcrContentValueConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.common.jcr.DefaultJcrContentValueConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentValueConverter<javax.jcr.Value>

    public class DefaultJcrContentValueConverter
extends Object
implements ContentValueConverter<javax.jcr.Value>
    Default ContentValueConverter implementation for JCR.

    Especially for binary data, this converts JCR Binary value to a data: URL if the data size is less than getDataUrlSizeThreashold(). Otherwise, this stores the binary data in an external FileObject in a randomly generated file under the getBinaryValueFileFolder() with the file name prefix, getBinaryFileNamePrefix(), and keeps the file URL string instead of the whole data.
